thread.section_title: PA Businessman Al Boscov Dies At Age 87 – CBS Philly
thread.title: PA Businessman Al Boscov Dies At Age 87
thread.title_full: PA Businessman Al Boscov Dies At Age 87

author: Ray Boyd
title: PA Businessman Al Boscov Dies At Age 87
text:
PHILADELPHIA (CBS) — Pennsylvania businessman and entrepreneur Al Boscov has died at the age of 87.
Boscov recently revealed that he was battling cancer.
BREAKING: Trailblazing Pa. businessman & entrepreneur Al Boscov has died at the age of 87 after recently disclosing he had cancer @CBSPhilly pic.twitter.com/JNqUqF3103 
— Joe Holden (@JoeHoldenCBS3) February 11, 2017 

Full story coming soon…
